actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the mailing of unsolicited commercial mail to persons filing a statement with the Postal Service indicating they do not desire to receive such mail.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits the mailing of unsolicited commercial mail to persons filing a statement with the Postal Service indicating they do not desire to receive such mail.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the mailing of unsolicited commercial mail to persons filing a statement with the Postal Service indicating they do not desire to receive such mail.
